short_description.value: Anekanta enables AI success with strategic guidance, training, standards alignment, and regulatory readiness.

long_description.value: Anekanta provides expert services for AI strategy and use case, board literacy, ISO/IEC 42001 and EU AI Act readiness. We support you at every stage to maximise ROI and reduce exposure. Our CPD-certified training gives boards and senior leaders the clarity they need to navigate AI risk, regulation, and opportunity. Anekanta helps boards and senior leaders adopt AI with confidence. We bring high-level thinking and clarity to a confusing landscape of ISO and regulatory requirements. Our goal is to transform AI uncertainty into value and drive AI success through innovative leadership.

value: AI Discovery and Use Case Evaluation
